I'm an Experienced IT Business Analyst with a demonstrated history of working with various computer software as well as developers and end users. I have a great interest in Information and Communications Technology with skills in Microsoft Office, SQL, MySQL HTML and Java. A professional with strong leadership and interpersonal skills.

I am a good team player, a people person, very adaptable and always ready to learn. My good interpersonal skills combined with my adaptable nature and ability to work with people of different cultures, allow me to change easily between tasks.
